00052         CdcSD::CdcSD(G4String name, MyVGeometryParameter* pointer)
00053 :MySD(name, pointer), hitsCollection(0)
00054 {
00055         m_GeometryParameter= dynamic_cast<CdcGeometryParameter*> (pointer);
00056         if (!m_GeometryParameter){
00057                 //              std::cout<<"In CdcSD::CdcSD, cannot get CdcGeometryParameter pointer!!!"<<std::endl;
00058                 G4Exception("CdcSD::CdcSD()",
00059                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00060                                 "cannot get CdcGeometryParameter pointer");
00061         }
00062 }
00063 
00064 CdcSD::~CdcSD(){
00065 }

00067 //-----------------------------------Initialize----------------------------------------------
00068 //Will be called by geant4 automatically at the beginning of each event
00069 void CdcSD::Initialize(G4HCofThisEvent* HCE)
00070 {
00071         hitsCollection = new CdcHitsCollection
00072                 (SensitiveDetectorName,collectionName[0]);
00073         std::cout<<"====>In CdcSD::Initialize(), created hitsCollection at ("<<(void*)hitsCollection<<std::endl;
00074         G4int HCID = -1;
00075         HCID = G4SDManager::GetSDMpointer()->GetCollectionID(collectionName[0]);
00076         if ( HCID < 0 ){
00077                 G4Exception("CdcSD::Initialize()",
00078                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00079                                 "Cann not find hitsCollection of this event");
00080         }
00081         HCE->AddHitsCollection( HCID, hitsCollection );
00082         int LayerNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_LayerNo();
00083         hitPointer.resize(m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_ID(LayerNo-3)+1);
00084         int icelllayer = 0;
00085         for( int  i = 0; i < LayerNo; i++ ){
00086                 if (m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_type(i)!=1) continue;
00087                 int CellNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_HoleNo(i)/2;
00088                 hitPointer[icelllayer].resize(CellNo);
00089                 std::cout<<"hitPointer["<<icelllayer<<"].resize("<<CellNo<<")"<<std::endl;
00090                 for( int j = 0; j < CellNo; j++ ){
00091                         hitPointer[icelllayer][j] = -1;
00092                 }
00093         }
00094         //initialize for root objects
00095         cdc_nHits = 0;
00096         m_x.clear();
00097         m_y.clear();
00098         m_z.clear();
00099         m_pOx.clear();
00100         m_pOy.clear();
00101         m_pOz.clear();
00102         m_t.clear();
00103         m_tstart.clear();
00104         m_tstop.clear();
00105         m_px.clear();
00106         m_py.clear();
00107         m_pz.clear();
00108         m_e.clear();
00109         m_ekin.clear();
00110         m_edep.clear();
00111         m_edepAll.clear();
00112         m_stepL.clear();
00113         m_nPair.clear();
00114         m_driftD.clear();
00115         m_layerID.clear();
00116         m_cellID.clear();
00117         m_tid.clear();
00118         m_pid.clear();
00119         m_particleName.clear();
00120         m_ppid.clear();
00121         m_ptid.clear();
00122         m_oprocess.clear();
00123         m_ovolName.clear();
00124         //initialize for filter
00125         nTracks = 0;
00126         prevTrackID = -100;
00127 }

00129 //-----------------------------------SetBranch----------------------------------------------
00130 //Should be called at the beginning of each run (now in MyAnalysisSvc::BeginOfRunAction())
00131 void CdcSD::SetBranch(){
00132         MyRoot* myRoot = MyRoot::GetMyRoot();
00133         G4String volName = get_VolName();
00134         if( flag_nHits ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_nHits", &cdc_nHits);
00135         if( flag_x ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_x", &m_x);
00136         if( flag_y ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_y", &m_y);
00137         if( flag_z ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_z", &m_z);
00138         if( flag_pOx ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pOx", &m_pOx);
00139         if( flag_pOy ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pOy", &m_pOy);
00140         if( flag_pOz ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pOz", &m_pOz);
00141         if( flag_t ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_t", &m_t);
00142         if( flag_tstart ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_tstart", &m_tstart);
00143         if( flag_tstop ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_tstop", &m_tstop);
00144         if( flag_px ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_px", &m_px);
00145         if( flag_py ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_py", &m_py);
00146         if( flag_pz ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pz", &m_pz);
00147         if( flag_e ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_e", &m_e);
00148         if( flag_ekin ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_ekin", &m_ekin);
00149         if( flag_edep ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_edep", &m_edep);
00150         if( flag_edepAll ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_edepAll", &m_edepAll);
00151         if( flag_stepL ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_stepL", &m_stepL);
00152         if( flag_nPair ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_nPair", &m_nPair);
00153         if( flag_driftD ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_driftD", &m_driftD);
00154         if( flag_layerID ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_layerID", &m_layerID);
00155         if( flag_cellID ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_cellID", &m_cellID);
00156         if( flag_tid ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_tid", &m_tid);
00157         if( flag_pid ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pid", &m_pid);
00158         if( flag_particleName ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_particleName", &m_particleName);
00159         if( flag_ppid) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_ppid", &m_ppid);
00160         if( flag_ptid) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_ptid", &m_ptid);
00161         if( flag_oprocess) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_oprocess", &m_oprocess);
00162         if( flag_ovolName) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_ovolName", &m_ovolName);
00163 }

00165 //-----------------------------------ReadOutputCard----------------------------------------------
00166 //Should be called before the begin of each run (now in the constructor of MyAnalysisSvc)
00167 void CdcSD::ReadOutputCard(G4String filename){
00168         ReSet();
00169         G4String volName = get_VolName();
00170         std::ifstream fin_card(filename);
00171         if(!fin_card){
00172                 std::cout<<"In CdcSD::ReadOutputCard, cannot open "<<filename<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00173                 G4Exception("CdcSD::ReadOutputCard()",
00174                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00175                                 "cannot find output card");
00176         }
00177         std::stringstream buf_card;
00178         std::string s_card;
00179         int n_output_section_symbol = 0;
00180         int n_filter_section_symbol = 0;
00181         G4String BRANCHSECTIONNAME = volName + "_SECTION";
00182         G4String FILTERSECTIONNAME = volName + "_FILTERSECTION";
00183         while(getline(fin_card,s_card)){
00184                 buf_card.str("");
00185                 buf_card.clear();
00186                 buf_card<<s_card;
00187 
00188                 //eleminate useless lines
00189                 const char* c_card = s_card.c_str();
00190                 int length = strlen(c_card);
00191                 int offset = 0;
00192                 for ( ; offset < length; offset++ ){
00193                         if ( c_card[offset] != ' ' ) break;
00194                 }
00195                 if ( c_card[offset] == '#' || (c_card[offset] == '/' && c_card[offset+1] == '/') || length - offset == 0 ){
00196                         continue;
00197                 }
00198 
00199                 std::string name;
00200                 buf_card>>name;
00201                 if ( n_output_section_symbol == 0 ){
00202                         if ( name == BRANCHSECTIONNAME ){
00203                                 n_output_section_symbol++;
00204                         }
00205                 }
00206                 else if ( n_output_section_symbol == 1 ){
00207                         if ( name == BRANCHSECTIONNAME ){
00208                                 n_output_section_symbol++;
00209                         }
00210                         else if( name == "nHits" ) flag_nHits = true;
00211                         else if( name == "x" ) {flag_x = true; buf_card>>unitName_x; unit_x = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_x);}
00212                         else if( name == "y" ) {flag_y = true; buf_card>>unitName_y; unit_y = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_y);}
00213                         else if( name == "z" ) {flag_z = true; buf_card>>unitName_z; unit_z = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_z);}
00214                         else if( name == "pOx" ) {flag_pOx = true; buf_card>>unitName_pOx; unit_pOx = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pOx);}
00215                         else if( name == "pOy" ) {flag_pOy = true; buf_card>>unitName_pOy; unit_pOy = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pOy);}
00216                         else if( name == "pOz" ) {flag_pOz = true; buf_card>>unitName_pOz; unit_pOz = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pOz);}
00217                         else if( name == "t" ) {flag_t = true; buf_card>>unitName_t; unit_t = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_t);}
00218                         else if( name == "tstart" ) {flag_tstart = true; buf_card>>unitName_tstart; unit_tstart = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_tstart);}
00219                         else if( name == "tstop" ) {flag_tstop = true; buf_card>>unitName_tstop; unit_tstop = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_tstop);}
00220                         else if( name == "px" ) {flag_px = true; buf_card>>unitName_px; unit_px = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_px);}
00221                         else if( name == "py" ) {flag_py = true; buf_card>>unitName_py; unit_py = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_py);}
00222                         else if( name == "pz" ) {flag_pz = true; buf_card>>unitName_pz; unit_pz = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pz);}
00223                         else if( name == "ekin" ) {{flag_ekin = true; buf_card>>unitName_ekin; unit_ekin = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_ekin);}}
00224                         else if( name == "e" ) {flag_e = true; buf_card>>unitName_e; unit_e = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_e);}
00225                         else if( name == "edep" ) {flag_edep = true; buf_card>>unitName_edep; unit_edep = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_edep);}
00226                         else if( name == "edepAll" ) {flag_edepAll = true; buf_card>>unitName_edepAll; unit_edepAll = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_edepAll);}
00227                         else if( name == "stepL" ) {{flag_stepL = true; buf_card>>unitName_stepL; unit_stepL = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_stepL);}}
00228                         else if( name == "nPair" ) {flag_nPair = true;}
00229                         else if( name == "driftD" ) {flag_driftD = true; buf_card>>unitName_driftD; unit_driftD = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_driftD);}
00230                         else if( name == "cellID" ) flag_cellID = true;
00231                         else if( name == "layerID" ) flag_layerID = true;
00232                         else if( name == "tid" ) flag_tid = true;
00233                         else if( name == "pid" ) flag_pid = true;
00234                         else if( name == "ppid" ) {flag_ppid = true;}
00235                         else if( name == "ptid" ) {flag_ptid = true;}
00236                         else if( name == "oprocess" ) {flag_oprocess = true;}
00237                         else if( name == "ovolName" ) {flag_ovolName = true;}
00238                         else if( name == "particleName" ) flag_particleName = true;
00239                         else{
00240                                 std::cout<<"In CdcSD::ReadOutputCard, unknown name: "<<name<<" in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00241                                 std::cout<<"Will ignore this line!"<<std::endl;
00242                         }
00243                 }
00244 
00245                 if ( n_filter_section_symbol == 0 ){
00246                         if ( name == FILTERSECTIONNAME ){
00247                                 n_filter_section_symbol++;
00248                         }
00249                 }
00250                 else if ( n_filter_section_symbol == 1 ){
00251                         if ( name == FILTERSECTIONNAME ){
00252                                 n_filter_section_symbol++;
00253                         }
00254                         else if( name == "Switch" ) Switch = true;
00255                         else if( name == "neutralCut" ) neutralCut = true;
00256                         else if( name == "maxn" ) buf_card>>maxn;
00257                         else if( name == "ntracks" ) buf_card>>ntracks;
00258                         else{
00259                                 G4double para;
00260                                 std::string unit;
00261                                 buf_card>>para>>unit;
00262                                 para *= MyString2Anything::get_U(unit);
00263                                 if( name == "minp" ) minp = para;
00264                                 else if ( name == "minedep" ) minedep = para;
00265                                 else if( name == "mint" ) mint = para;
00266                                 else if( name == "maxt" ) maxt = para;
00267                                 else if( name == "tres" ) tres = para;
00268                                 else{
00269                                         std::cout<<"In CdcSD::ReadOutputCard, unknown name: "<<name<<" in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00270                                         std::cout<<"Will ignore this line!"<<std::endl;
00271                                 }
00272                         }
00273                 }
00274 
00275                 if ( n_output_section_symbol > 1 && n_filter_section_symbol > 1 ){
00276                         break;
00277                 }
00278         }
00279         buf_card.str("");
00280         buf_card.clear();
00281         if ( n_output_section_symbol <= 1 ){
00282                 std::cout<<"*****************WARNING********************"<<std::endl;
00283                 std::cout<<"In CdcSD::ReadOutputCard, failed to find enough section seperators for output in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00284                 std::cout<<"Seperator: "<<BRANCHSECTIONNAME<<std::endl;
00285                 std::cout<<"Will use default settings."<<std::endl;
00286                 std::cout<<"********************************************"<<std::endl;
00287         }
00288         if ( n_filter_section_symbol<= 1 ){
00289                 std::cout<<"*****************WARNING********************"<<std::endl;
00290                 std::cout<<"In CdcSD::ReadOutputCard, failed to find enough section seperators for filter in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00291                 std::cout<<"Seperator: "<<FILTERSECTIONNAME<<std::endl;
00292                 std::cout<<"Will use default settings."<<std::endl;
00293                 std::cout<<"********************************************"<<std::endl;
00294         }
00295         fin_card.close();
00296         ShowOutCard();
00297 }

00299 //-----------------------------------ReSet----------------------------------------------
00300 //Private
00301 void CdcSD::ReSet(){
00302         //default output set
00303         flag_nHits = false;
00304         flag_x = false;
00305         flag_y = false;
00306         flag_z = false;
00307         flag_pOx = false;
00308         flag_pOy = false;
00309         flag_pOz = false;
00310         flag_t = true;
00311         flag_tstart = true;
00312         flag_tstop = true;
00313         flag_px = false;
00314         flag_py = false;
00315         flag_pz = false;
00316         flag_e = false;
00317         flag_ekin = false;
00318         flag_edep = false;
00319         flag_edepAll = false;
00320         flag_stepL = false;
00321         flag_nPair = false;
00322         flag_driftD = false;
00323         flag_cellID = false;
00324         flag_layerID = false;
00325         flag_tid = true;
00326         flag_pid = false;
00327         flag_particleName = false;
00328         flag_ppid = false;
00329         flag_ptid = false;
00330         flag_oprocess = false;
00331         flag_ovolName = false;
00332         //for fileter
00333         Switch = false;
00334         neutralCut = false;
00335         minp = 1.5*MeV;
00336         maxn = 1000;
00337         ntracks = 1;
00338         mint = 0;
00339         maxt = 0;
00340         tres = 0;
00341         minedep = 0;
00342         //for units
00343         unitName_pOx = "cm";
00344         unitName_pOy = "cm";
00345         unitName_pOz = "cm";
00346         unitName_x = "cm";
00347         unitName_y = "cm";
00348         unitName_z = "cm";
00349         unitName_t = "ns";
00350         unitName_tstart = "ns";
00351         unitName_tstop = "ns";
00352         unitName_px = "GeV";
00353         unitName_py = "GeV";
00354         unitName_pz = "GeV";
00355         unitName_ekin = "GeV";
00356         unitName_e = "GeV";
00357         unitName_edep = "GeV";
00358         unitName_edepAll = "GeV";
00359         unitName_stepL = "cm";
00360         unitName_driftD = "cm";
00361         unit_pOx = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pOx);
00362         unit_pOy = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pOy);
00363         unit_pOz = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pOz);
00364         unit_x = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_x);
00365         unit_y = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_y);
00366         unit_z = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_z);
00367         unit_t = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_t);
00368         unit_tstart = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_tstart);
00369         unit_tstop = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_tstop);
00370         unit_px = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_px);
00371         unit_py = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_py);
00372         unit_pz = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pz);
00373         unit_ekin = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_ekin);
00374         unit_e = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_e);
00375         unit_edep = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_edep);
00376         unit_edepAll = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_edepAll);
00377         unit_stepL = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_stepL);
00378         unit_driftD = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_driftD);
00379 }

00383 void CdcSD::ShowOutCard(){

00393         std::cout<<"output t?      "<<(flag_t?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_t<<std::endl;
00394         std::cout<<"output tstart? "<<(flag_tstart?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_tstart<<std::endl;
00395         std::cout<<"output tstop?  "<<(flag_tstop?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_tstop<<std::endl;

00419         std::cout<<"minedep =      "<<minedep/MeV<<"MeV"<<std::endl;
00420         std::cout<<"VerboseLevel = "<<get_VerboseLevel()<<std::endl;
00421         std::cout<<"******************************************************************************"<<std::endl;
00422 }
00423 
00424 //-----------------------------------ProcessHits----------------------------------------------
00425 //Will be called by geant4 automatically everytime a step in CdcSD generated
00426 G4bool CdcSD::ProcessHits(G4Step* aStep,G4TouchableHistory* touchableHistory)
00427 {
00428 
00429         std::cout<<__LINE__<<std::endl;
00430         std::cout<<"In CdcSD::ProcessHits()"<<std::endl;
00431         //*************************get useful variables***********************
00432 
00433         int status;
00434         // get track info
00435         G4Track* gTrack = aStep->GetTrack() ;
00436         G4int trackID= gTrack->GetTrackID(); //G4 track ID of current track.
00437         G4double globalT=gTrack->GetGlobalTime();//Time since the event in which the track belongs is created
00438         G4int charge = gTrack->GetDefinition()->GetPDGCharge();
00439         G4int pid = gTrack->GetDefinition()->GetPDGEncoding();
00440         G4double theta = gTrack->GetMomentumDirection().theta();
00441 
00442         // get information at the beginning and at the end of step
00443         G4StepPoint* prePoint  = aStep->GetPreStepPoint() ;
00444         G4StepPoint* postPoint = aStep->GetPostStepPoint() ;
00445         G4double total_e = prePoint->GetTotalEnergy();
00446         G4double ekin = prePoint->GetKineticEnergy();
00447         G4ThreeVector pointIn_mom = prePoint->GetMomentum();
00448         G4double pointIn_pa = pointIn_mom.mag();
00449         G4ThreeVector pointIn_pos = prePoint->GetPosition();
00450         G4ThreeVector pointOut_pos = postPoint->GetPosition();
00451         G4double pointIn_time = prePoint->GetGlobalTime();//Time since the event in which the track belongs is created
00452 
00453         // get step info
00454         G4double edep = aStep->GetTotalEnergyDeposit();
00455         G4double edepNonIoni = aStep->GetNonIonizingEnergyDeposit();
00456         G4double edepIoni = edep - edepNonIoni;
00457         G4double stepL = aStep->GetStepLength();
00458 
00459         CDCSD_LINEVAR(pointIn_pos.x());
00460         CDCSD_LINEVAR(pointIn_pos.y());
00461         CDCSD_LINEVAR(pointIn_pos.z());
00462         //*************************filter***********************
00463         //switch
00464         if (!Switch) return false;
00465         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00466 
00467         //ntracks
00468         if ( trackID != prevTrackID ){
00469                 prevTrackID = trackID;
00470                 nTracks++;
00471         }
00472         if ( nTracks > ntracks && ntracks) return false;
00473         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00474 
00475         //maxn
00476         if ( maxn && cdc_nHits >= maxn ) return false;
00477         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00478 
00479         //minp
00480         if ( minp && pointIn_pa < minp ) return false;
00481         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00482 
00483         //time_window
00484         if(isnan(globalT)){
00485                 G4cout<<"CdcSD:error, globalT is nan "<<G4endl;
00486                 return false;
00487         }
00488         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00489         if ( globalT < mint && mint ) return false;
00490         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00491         if ( globalT > maxt && maxt ) return false;
00492         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00493 
00494         //neutralCut
00495         if ( charge == 0 && neutralCut ) return false;
00496         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00497 
00498         //edep
00499         if( edepIoni <= minedep ) return false;
00500         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00501 
00502         //*************************calculate hitPosition****************************
00503         std::cout<<__LINE__<<std::endl;
00504         G4ThreeVector hitPosition = pointIn_pos;
00505         G4ThreeVector localHitPosition = prePoint->GetTouchableHandle()->GetHistory()->GetTopTransform().TransformPoint(hitPosition);
00506         G4double deltaZ = localHitPosition.z();
00507         G4double driftD = 0;
00508         G4double driftV = 0.025*mm/ns;
00509         G4double driftT;
00510         G4double signalT;
00511         // to get layerId and cellId
00512         G4int layerId, cellId;
00513         G4int holeLayerId, holeId;
00514         // which layer?
00515         const G4VTouchable *touchable = prePoint->GetTouchable();
00516         holeLayerId= touchable->GetReplicaNumber(0);
00517         layerId=m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_ID(holeLayerId);
00518         // get layer info
00519         G4double phi = localHitPosition.phi()+pi; // (-pi,pi) => (0,2*pi)
00520         G4double Length = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_length(holeLayerId);
00521         G4double deltaphi = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_angle4rotate(holeLayerId)*(0.5+deltaZ/Length)+m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_SPhi(holeLayerId);
00522         phi -= deltaphi;
00523         // which cell?
00524         int HoleNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_HoleNo(holeLayerId);
00525         double holeDphi = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_holeDphi(holeLayerId);
00526         holeId = phi/holeDphi;
00527         std::cout<<"holeId = "<<phi/pi<<"/"<<holeDphi/pi<<" = "<<holeId<<std::endl;
00528         std::cout<<"HoleNo = "<<HoleNo<<std::endl;
00529         if (holeId<0) holeId+=HoleNo;
00530         else if (holeId>=HoleNo) holeId-=HoleNo;
00531         // how about corner effect?
00532         if (m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_type(holeLayerId)==1){ // outer part of a cell
00533         }
00534         cellId = holeId/2;
00535         // position of sense wire at that z plane
00536         G4ThreeVector localWirePositionAtHitPlane = G4ThreeVector(1,1,1);
00537         localWirePositionAtHitPlane.setMag(m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_Rc(holeLayerId));
00538         localWirePositionAtHitPlane.setZ(deltaZ);
00539         localWirePositionAtHitPlane.setPhi((holeId/2*2+1)*holeDphi+deltaphi);
00540         driftD = (localHitPosition-localWirePositionAtHitPlane).perp();
00541 
00542         G4double vc = 299792458*m/s; // m/s
00543         G4double wiredelay = (Length/2-deltaZ)/vc;
00544         driftT = driftD/driftV;
00545         signalT = driftT+pointIn_time+wiredelay;
00546 
00547         //*******************generate or modify hit************************
00548         std::cout<<__LINE__<<std::endl;
00549         bool needpush = false;
00550         if (hitPointer[layerId][cellId] != -1){
00551                 std::cout<<__LINE__<<std::endl;
00552                 CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00553                 G4int pointer=hitPointer[layerId][cellId];
00554                 std::cout<<"hitPointer["<<layerId<<"]["<<cellId<<"] = "<<pointer<<std::endl;
00555                 G4double pretstop = m_tstop[pointer]*unit_tstop;
00556                 std::cout<<__LINE__<<std::endl;
00557                 G4double pretstart  = m_tstart[pointer]*unit_tstart;
00558                 std::cout<<__LINE__<<std::endl;
00559                 if (trackID==m_tid[pointer]&&tres&&signalT-pretstop<tres&&pretstart-signalT<tres) {
00560                         std::cout<<__LINE__<<std::endl;
00561                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00562                                 std::cout<<"    Update Hit!!!"<<std::endl;
00563                         }
00564                         if(flag_edep) m_edep[pointer] += (edepIoni)/unit_edep;
00565                         if(flag_edepAll) m_edepAll[pointer] += (edep)/unit_edepAll;
00566                         //Set for root objects
00567                         if(globalT<m_t[pointer]*unit_t){// is this possible?
00568                                 std::cout<<__LINE__<<std::endl;
00569                                 if(flag_x) m_x[pointer] = hitPosition.x()/unit_x;
00570                                 if(flag_y) m_y[pointer] = hitPosition.y()/unit_y;
00571                                 if(flag_z) m_z[pointer] = hitPosition.z()/unit_z;
00572                                 if(flag_t) m_t[pointer] = globalT/unit_t;
00573                                 if(flag_e) m_e[pointer] = total_e/unit_e;
00574                                 if(flag_ekin) m_ekin[pointer] = ekin/unit_ekin;
00575                                 if(flag_px) m_px[pointer] = pointIn_mom.x()/unit_px;
00576                                 if(flag_py) m_py[pointer] = pointIn_mom.y()/unit_py;
00577                                 if(flag_pz) m_pz[pointer] = pointIn_mom.z()/unit_pz;
00578                         }
00579                         else{
00580                                 std::cout<<__LINE__<<std::endl;
00581                                 if(flag_pOx) m_pOx[pointer] = pointOut_pos.x()/unit_pOx;
00582                                 if(flag_pOy) m_pOy[pointer] = pointOut_pos.y()/unit_pOy;
00583                                 if(flag_pOz) m_pOz[pointer] = pointOut_pos.z()/unit_pOz;
00584                         }
00585                         std::cout<<__LINE__<<std::endl;
00586                         if (signalT<m_tstart[pointer]*unit_tstart) m_tstart[pointer] = signalT/unit_tstart;
00587                         else if (signalT>m_tstop[pointer]*unit_tstop) m_tstop[pointer] = signalT/unit_tstop;
00588                         if(flag_stepL) m_stepL[pointer] += stepL/unit_stepL;
00589                         if(flag_nPair) m_nPair[pointer]++;
00590                         if(flag_driftD) if(driftD<m_driftD[pointer]*unit_driftD) m_driftD[pointer] = driftD/unit_driftD;
00591                         std::cout<<__LINE__<<std::endl;
00592                 }
00593                 else needpush = true;
00594         }
00595         else needpush = true;
00596         if (needpush){
00597                 std::cout<<__LINE__<<std::endl;
00598                 CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00599                 CdcHit* newHit = new CdcHit();
00600                 newHit->SetTrackID(trackID);
00601                 newHit->SetLayerNo(layerId);
00602                 newHit->SetCellNo(cellId);
00603                 newHit->SetEdep(edepIoni);
00604                 newHit->SetPos(hitPosition);
00605                 newHit->SetDriftD(driftD);
00606                 newHit->SetTheta(theta);
00607                 newHit->SetPosFlag(0);
00608                 newHit->SetEnterAngle(0);
00609                 newHit->SetDriftT (signalT);
00610                 newHit->SetGlobalT(globalT);
00611                 hitsCollection->insert(newHit);
00612                 G4int NbHits = hitsCollection->entries();
00613                 hitPointer[layerId][cellId]=NbHits-1;
00614                 //Set for root objects
00615                 if(flag_x) m_x.push_back(hitPosition.x()/unit_x);
00616                 if(flag_y) m_y.push_back(hitPosition.y()/unit_y);
00617                 if(flag_z) m_z.push_back(hitPosition.z()/unit_z);
00618                 if(flag_t) m_t.push_back(globalT/unit_t);
00619                 if(flag_t) m_tstart.push_back(signalT/unit_tstart);
00620                 if(flag_t) m_tstop.push_back(signalT/unit_tstop);
00621                 if(flag_px) m_px.push_back(pointIn_mom.x()/unit_px);
00622                 if(flag_py) m_py.push_back(pointIn_mom.y()/unit_py);
00623                 if(flag_pz) m_pz.push_back(pointIn_mom.z()/unit_pz);
00624                 if(flag_ekin) m_ekin.push_back(ekin/unit_ekin);
00625                 if(flag_e) m_e.push_back(total_e/unit_e);
00626                 if(flag_edep) m_edep.push_back(edepIoni/unit_edep);
00627                 if(flag_edepAll) m_edepAll.push_back(edep/unit_edepAll);
00628                 if(flag_stepL) m_stepL.push_back(stepL/unit_stepL);
00629                 if(flag_nPair) m_nPair.push_back(1);
00630                 if(flag_driftD) m_driftD.push_back(driftD/unit_driftD);
00631                 if(flag_layerID) m_layerID.push_back(layerId);
00632                 if(flag_cellID) m_cellID.push_back(cellId);
00633                 if(flag_tid) m_tid.push_back(trackID);
00634                 if(flag_pid) m_pid.push_back(pid);
00635                 cdc_nHits++;
00636                 std::cout<<__LINE__<<std::endl;
00637         }
00638         std::cout<<__LINE__<<std::endl;
00639         return true;
00640 }
